room_quality.comm: The rooms are spacious, modern, and well-appointed, offering comfort for guests.

cont.itemA: We were in a room with 2 beds, fridge, & micro, which was nice and modern looking. The room is perfect for one or two people.
cont.itemB: Suites are large, well-appointed, with fabulous bathrooms. The room is spacious, comfortable and well-appointed.

comfort.comm: The bedding is soft, offering a comfortable sleep experience.

cont.itemA: The sheets are soft and there are four pillows on the bed!
cont.itemB: The fluffy down duvets are delightful too.

cleanliness.comm: The hotel maintains a high level of cleanliness throughout.

cont.itemA: The hotel was clean, and the free breakfast was a big hit.

staff_service.comm: The staff are friendly, helpful, and responsive to guests' needs.

cont.itemA: Staff are very friendly, willing to help in any way possible, and have been gracious during stays.
cont.itemB: The staff is exceptionally friendly, providing twenty-four-hour room service and helpful concierge service.

location.comm: The hotel is conveniently located in vibrant areas with access to dining and nightlife options.

cont.itemA: This hotel is in the heart of Lincoln Park, with great little shops, restaurants, and bars nearby.
cont.itemB: The location can't be beat, it is in the heart of the Gold Coast near Michigan Avenue and other major attractions.

itemA.breakfast: The free breakfast was excellent with muffins and make-your-own waffles.
itemA.value: This hotel is the cheapest decent option I could find in Chicago and is perfect for the price.

itemB.amenities: The hotel features flat-screen satellite televisions and iHome alarm clocks.
itemB.service: They provide valet parking, although it can be hard to get to the front.
